entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
